titles.title: A resolution expressing the Sense of the Senate concerning the United Nation's arms embargo against Bosnia-Herzegovina, a nation's right to self-defense, and peace negotiations.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2844-2845)
Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4045-4047)
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6693-6695)
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8153-8154)

bill.summary: 3/11/1993--Introduced. Declares that: (1) the United States should work with the United Nations Security Council to lift the international arms embargo as it applies to Bosnia-Herzegovina; and (2) such action should be taken on a timely basis to complement the peace process.
